speaker.name: Sangarshanan
speaker.biography: My name is Sangarshanan and I am a Software Engineer. I love making stuff that helps and amuses me in equal measure and standing upside down while holding a banana. When I'm bored you can find me making absurdist memes, yet another Spotify playlist or staring straight into the void
